Experience

Graduate Researcher, Robotic Manipulation, Oregon State University

Duration - 2 years

I am a graduate student researcher who is working on applying machine learning on robot hand to learn grasping strategies from humans. My research work is under supervision of Prof. Cindy Grimm, Prof. Xiaoli Fern and Prof. Ravi Balasubramanian.

Graduate Teaching Assistant, MIME, Oregon State University

Duration - 1 year

My responsibilities as TA generally involve holding office hours, grading assignments and exams, attending lab sessions.

Mechanical Engineer Intern, A.K.Ong Engineering Pte. Ltd. (Singapore)

Duration - 6 months

I was an intern at the company, mainly in charge of modifying CAD drawings of the HVAC designs, coordinating with engineers from other companies, supervising the installation of ventilation ducts and air conditioning systems.
